name: Out in the Outland
description:
Hello, this is latest jam entry from Team Koala Lampoon. It's takes place in a post-apocolyptic setting in the Mongolian steppes starring an agender character named Bataar. The player traverses through the "Outland", the wilderness of Mongolia, to help brew a special tea for is mother. Use WASD or arrow keys to control.

Cover Image from Free Images. Ending code done by mildmojo. Bitsy created by Adam Le Doux.
